Inertiaconf 2020

June 13 - 18

Get tickets

Portland, Oregon

Get inspired by the world's best designers

InertiaConf has been the largest gathering of great designers & developers in the world since 2010. In this year's edition we’re so excited to host it in beautiful Dublin, one of our favorite cities. Hope to see you there!

Speakers

Karen Stuart
Dropbox
Jessica Lawrence
Freelancer
Phillip Christopher
Apple
John Smith
Microsoft
Ernest Hemingway
Instagram
Maria Sharapova
Basecamp
Lisa Simpson
Metalab
Jim Morrison
Facebook
Ana Williams
Heroku

Purchase Tickets

1-Day Access

Get tickets
Conferences

You'll hear talks from people who are the top of the industry. They'll be sharing their tips, tricks and stories on how they've built their own startups and projects.

Workshop

In this version of the conference, we'll welcome industry experts in design and development. Our goal is to inspire you to create and build amazing things.

Full Weekend Access

Get tickets
Conferences

You'll hear talks from people who are the top of the industry. They'll be sharing their tips, tricks and stories on how they've built their own startups and projects.

Workshop

If you stay all weekend, we'll work with industry experts in design and development. Our goal is to inspire you to create and build amazing things.

After parties

We'll be doing a bunch of activities after the talks, we'll have our famous happy hour, happy networking, and the night bonfire on the beach.

Event Location

Oregon Convention Center
10th Street 12/3 4580 Portland, Or.

01-800 555-3312 support@Inertiaconf.com
